plugins.name: Section Distributor
plugins.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
plugins.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

134431.name: Section Distributor
134431.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
134431.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

plugins.name: Tokenize Your Design
plugins.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

133450.name: Tokenize Your Design
133450.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin may need to access resources from any domain for maximum flexibility during development and for future integrations.

133450.release_notes: In this version, the stroke colors will also be updated along with the fill color tokens.
133450.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

134125.description:

How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)

If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
134125.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

plugins.name: Hotkey
plugins.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
plugins.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

135952.name: Hotkey
135952.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
135952.release_notes:
Commands:
1. New Increase/Decrease Width & Height Commands: Use +h, -h, +w, and -w to dynamically adjust height and width values relative to current dimensions.

Other Changes:
1. Added support for + and - prefixes in command parsing (e.g., +h12, -w8) and updated internal regex handling accordingly.
135952.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

plugins.name: Find Elements
plugins.description:
Using this tool, we can find any Text Nodes having phrase 'Lorem' i.e. dummy text across the entire page. Then we can find any Text Nodes which do not match the font parameters i.e. Font Family, Style and Size. Finally, we can also find all nodes not matching the color given in hex values.

This is tool is helpful to find mis-matched items based on the given parameters.
plugins.tagline: Find text having 'Lorem', find text with non-matching font and find items with non-matching colors

plugins.name: Background Manager
plugins.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
plugins.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

plugins.name: SnapCap
plugins.description:
Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your FigJam board or Figma Design file in a single click, making it easier than ever to document user experiences as you browse the web.


Please note that to use SnapCap, you will also need to install the companion Chrome extension at snapcap.app/extension


How to Use SnapCap

Installation

  1. Install the Figma plugin
  2. Install the Chrome browser extension, and pin it


Session Setup

  1. Open the FigJam board or Figma Design file where you wish to send screenshots
  2. Launch the Figma plugin and click "Start new session"
  3. Copy the generated session code
  4. Click on the SnapCap browser extension and enter the copied session code


Taking Screenshots

Once your session has connected, click on the SnapCap browser extension anytime you want to take a screenshot and send it to your Figma file. A check mark will be shown on the extension icon to indicate that the screenshot was captured successfully, and it will show up moments later in the Figma file where the FigCap plugin is running.


Ending Session

When you are done taking screenshots, click the End button. If the SnapCap browser extension does not automatically disconnect, you can right click on the extension icon and select "End session"


Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/
plugins.tagline: Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your Figma files

Ending Session

Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/

plugins.name: Fig-Refactor
plugins.description:
Call for Sponsorship: Support the Development


Fig-Refactor – Replace Spacing with Figma Variables in One Click


Fig-Refactor is a Figma plugin designed to bring structure and scalability to your design files by replacing hardcoded gaps and paddings with Figma variables — in bulk.


Fig-Refactor intelligently scans your selection or entire file, matches raw spacing values to the closest variable from your local or team library, and replaces them with a single click. It even skips values already using variables, keeping your workflow non-destructive and efficient.


✨ Features:

  1. 🔍 Smart matching – Suggests the closest variable for each spacing value
  2. 🧠 Supports team libraries – Load and use variables from shared libraries
  3. 📁 Flexible scanning – Target specific selections or scan the entire file
  4. 🚫 Non-destructive – Ignores values already assigned to a variable


Currently in active development, Fig-Refactor is already making design systems cleaner and easier to manage — and with your support, it can go even further. Your sponsorship helps fund ongoing development, bug fixes, and new features like auto-thresholds, preview modes, and batch review.


📹 DEMO

❤️ Support this project


Your support helps keep this plugin alive and evolving.

Thank you for making design better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Refactor Your  Figma Spacing  in Seconds

plugins.name: Export to Denada
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

121997.name: Export to Denada
121997.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
121997.release_notes: Allow exporting any layer, not just Frame layers.
121997.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

plugins.name: Layout Aware Renaming
plugins.description:
Features

- Auto-Detect Grids: Automatically detects rows and columns in your selection.

- Custom Naming: Add prefixes and choose between numeric or alphabetic suffixes.

- Manual Override: Specify exact rows/columns when auto-detection fails.

- Mixed Sizes: Works with elements of different sizes in the same grid.

- Figma & FigJam: Compatible with both Figma and FigJam (limited support).

plugins.name: Namer | Неймер
plugins.description:
Namer renames selected frames based on their position (top-to-bottom, left-to-right) on the canvas, ignoring layer hierarchy. Adds sequential numbers with your custom prefix: Prefix_1, Prefix_2, etc.


Неймер переименовывает выбранные фреймы по их расположению на рабочей области (сверху-вниз, слева-направо), игнорируя иерархию слоев. Добавляет порядковые номера с вашим префиксом: Префикс_1, Префикс_2 и т.д.


How to Use / Как использовать:

  1. Select frames → Open plugin → Click "Переименовать".
  2. Выберите фреймы → Запустите плагин → Нажмите «Переименовать».
plugins.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

plugins.name: Maruco
plugins.description:
What is this?

Maruco is a plugin that provides rules and validation for component naming, helping you identify components that violate naming conventions and elements.


1. Selecting naming convention.

There are several conventions, let's select the best one for your project.


2. Entering naming elements.

Next, you can enter "words" that makes up the component's name.

Enter a comma between words to set multiple words.

Maruco guesses that the component's name is made up of three elements: a prefix, a middle word and a suffix.


3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
plugins.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Generate stunning charts for data visualization with ease

plugins.name: 打印工具 Figma Print Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

Figma Print Pro is a specialized plugin that helps you create print-ready documents directly in Figma. Easily set up standard or custom page sizes, add bleed areas and crop marks, export high-quality PDFs in multiple color formats, and ensure professional results with built-in DPI checks.


Function Description

  1. Custom & Preset Dimensions: Choose from popular print sizes (A4, A3, B5) or enter exact dimensions.
  2. Bleed & Crop Marks: Add bleed lines and crop marks to prepare for professional trimming.
  3. Multi-page Documents: Generate multi-page print layouts all within a single Figma file.
  4. Color Management: Export PDFs in RGB, CMYK, or grayscale for precise color control.
  5. Adjustable Image Quality: Downsample images and set compression levels to optimize file size.
  6. DPI Checks: Analyze frames to confirm whether resolution meets professional print standards.


Usage

  1. Set Up a Document: In the plugin panel, pick a preset size (A4, A3, B5) or enter your custom width and height.
  2. Adjust Settings: Define bleed margins, enable crop marks, and specify the page count.
  3. Preview: The plugin generates a quick visual preview of each page.
  4. Export to PDF: Choose a color format (RGB, CMYK, or grayscale), select image quality settings, then export.
  5. Check DPI: Run the DPI check tool to ensure images and frames meet print-quality standards.


Tips

  1. Recommended DPI: For most print jobs, 300 DPI is standard. Ensure your images and frames meet or exceed this resolution.
  2. Color Consistency: When using CMYK, note that colors may differ slightly from on-screen previews.
  3. Bleed Setup: If your printer requires a bleed, confirm the exact measurement specifications with your print provider.
  4. Downsampling: Keep an eye on image clarity if you significantly reduce the DPI to minimize file size.


介绍

Figma Print Pro 是一款专为在 Figma 中直接创建印刷文档的插件。它支持自定义或常见的标准纸张尺寸，允许添加出血线和裁切线，支持导出多种颜色格式的高质量 PDF，并可进行 DPI 检查，帮助您轻松获得专业的印刷效果。


功能说明

  1. 自定义与预设尺寸：可使用常见的印刷尺寸（A4、A3、B5）或自行输入宽高。
  2. 出血线与裁切线：可配置出血线并添加裁切线，满足专业印刷需求。
  3. 多页文档：在单个 Figma 文件中快速生成多页的打印版面。
  4. 颜色管理：支持 RGB、CMYK 以及灰度输出，便于精确控制印刷颜色。
  5. 可调节图像质量：支持图像降采样并可设置压缩比，实现更小文件体积。
  6. DPI 检查：可检查 Frame 分辨率，判断是否符合专业印刷要求。


使用方法

  1. 文档设置：在插件面板中，选择 A4、A3、B5 等预设尺寸，或手动输入自定义宽高。
  2. 参数调整：设定出血值、是否添加裁切线，以及需要的页面数量。
  3. 预览页面：插件会生成每页的预览，方便快速查看效果。
  4. 导出 PDF：选择颜色模式（RGB、CMYK 或灰度），根据需求调整图像质量后即可导出。
  5. 检查 DPI：使用 DPI 检查功能，确保图像或 Frame 的分辨率达到了可印刷的标准。


注意事项

  1. 建议 DPI：一般印刷要求 300 DPI，确保图像及画框分辨率符合或高于该标准。
  2. 颜色差异：使用 CMYK 模式时，实际印刷颜色可能与屏幕上显示的略有偏差。
  3. 出血线设置：如印刷厂有特殊要求，请提前确认所需的出血值。
  4. 图像降采样：若大幅降低分辨率以减小文件体积，需注意图像清晰度的影响。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Streamline print creation & DPI checks in Figma

plugins.name: Osouji
plugins.description:
整理整頓したいアイテム群選択後にこのプラグインを起動すると、同じ名前のフレームや、テキスト、シェイプ、画像などを自動的にグループ化して一覧化してくれます。作業スペースが整理され、過去のアイデアを見つけやすくなりますよ！


----


When you start this plug-in after selecting a group of items you want to organize, frames with the same name, text, shapes, images, etc. will be automatically grouped and listed. Your workspace will be organized and it will be easier to find past ideas!
plugins.tagline: 選択したアイテムを自動でグループ化し、整理整頓された一覧を作成します。

plugins.name: Sizely
plugins.description: Sizely streamlines your design workflow by intelligently scaling any element dropped into a frame. Choose from preset ratios (1/4, 1/2, 3/4, Full) and three scaling modes (Fit Width, Fit Height, Custom Scale) to maintain perfect proportions every time.
plugins.tagline: Auto-scaling made easy.

139548.name: Sizely
139548.description: Sizely streamlines your design workflow by intelligently scaling any element dropped into a frame. Choose from preset ratios (1/4, 1/2, 3/4, Full) and three scaling modes (Fit Width, Fit Height, Custom Scale) to maintain perfect proportions every time.

plugins.name: Typemaker — Design your font, live in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs into downloadable TTF fonts! Typemaker streamlines the process of creating custom fonts directly within your design workflow.


🎨 Key Features:

•Automatically generates frames for all characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, symbols)

•Draw your glyphs directly in Figma using any design tool

•Built-in alignment guides for typographic consistency

•Visibility controls to organize your workspace

•Direct export to professional TTF format


⚡How it works:

1•Click "Create Glyph Frames" to generate the character grid

2•Design your glyphs inside the frames using shapes, pen tool, or imported SVGs

3•Customize font name and family

4•Download your ready-to-install TTF font


🔧 Perfect for:

•Graphic designers creating original typefaces

•Branding projects requiring custom typography

•Rapid prototyping of typographic concepts

•Educational projects and creative experimentation


Start creating your custom typography today!
plugins.tagline: Create custom TTF fonts directly in Figma! Draw glyphs, export professional fonts instantly.

plugins.name: FigJam Planning Card Creator
plugins.description:
Add structured planning cards to your FigJam boards for agile planning and project management. This plugin helps teams quickly create consistent planning cards with fields like objectives, dependencies, requirements, and time estimates.


Key features:

  1. Import multiple cards at once using YAML or JSON format
  2. Create custom cards with structured fields (title, objective, dependencies, requirements, estimated lift, dates)
  3. Smart placement options - add cards inside sections or below any selection
  4. Pre-formatted cards with proper styling and typography
  5. Great for setting up sprint planning, backlog grooming, and project roadmapping


Works with sections and sticky notes. Select where you want cards and choose from built-in templates, create custom cards, or paste card definitions to bulk import.


📄 YAML/JSON Templates & Examples

📖 Documentation

🏢 Made by Prelude
plugins.tagline: Create structured planning cards for agile workflows using templates or bulk import

plugins.name: Align Auto Layout
plugins.description:
MacOS shortcut setup:

System Settings → Keyboard → Keyboard Shortcuts → App Shortcuts → “+”.

App: Figma.

Menu Title:

Plugins->Align Auto Layout->Move alignment up

(repeat for down/left/right).

Press the desired keys, e.g. ⌃⌥W, and save.

Your new keys now trigger the plugin commands in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Instantly nudge auto-layout frames—left, right, up, down—for lightning-fast design workflows.

138621.name: Align Auto Layout
138621.description:
MacOS shortcut setup:

System Settings → Keyboard → Keyboard Shortcuts → App Shortcuts → “+”.

App: Figma.

Menu Title:

Plugins->Align Auto Layout->Move alignment up

(repeat for down/left/right).

Press the desired keys, e.g. ⌃⌥W, and save.

Your new keys now trigger the plugin commands in Figma.
138621.tagline: Instantly nudge auto-layout frames—left, right, up, down—for lightning-fast design workflows.

plugins.name: Jo - Instant Design Feedback
plugins.description:
Stop designing in the dark.

Jo gives you instant validation without leaving Figma.


Two ways to get unstuck:

🔍 Heuristic Check — Usability feedback against Nielsen's 10 principles

Select a frame → get ranked issues with specific fixes


📊 Quick Poll — Stakeholder sign-off in minutes

Select 2-4 frames → Generate link → teammates vote/comment (no Figma login required)


Why designers are loving Jo:

✅ In-Context Feedback: Feedback panel sits right next to your canvas.

🎯 Actionable Insights: Specific fixes, not vague opinions.

⏱️ Zero Meeting Overhead: Async feedback that actually works.

🔁 Iteration-Friendly: Tweak, test, and ship with confidence.


Perfect for:

Validating concepts, streamlining stakeholder buy-in, catching usability issues before dev handoff.


Ready to design with confidence?

Install Jo today and transform your feedback loops!
plugins.tagline: Get AI and teammate feedback on your designs. No meetings, no guesswork.

plugins.name: Variable Linter
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that helps analyze, audit, and replace variables in your Figma designs. Scan selected layers for bound variables, categorize them by source, and efficiently replace variables with those from approved collections.


Features


🔍 Variable Analysis


Deep Scanning: Analyzes nested components, variants, and instances

Source Categorization: Identifies variables as local, team library, or orphaned

Type-Safe Analysis: Categorizes variables by type (color, number, string, boolean)

Real-time Results: Instant scanning of selected layers


📊 Variable Management


Approval System: Mark specific variable collections as approved replacement sources

Bulk Operations: Replace multiple variables of the same type simultaneously

Individual Replacement: Replace variables one at a time with precise control

Orphan Detection: Identifies variables that no longer exist in their collections


🎯 Smart Filtering


Toggle Views: Switch between all variables and unapproved variables only

Sortable Tables: Sort by name, type, value, or source

Search & Filter: Find specific variables quickly


📋 Team Library Integration


Library Detection: Automatically identifies team libraries and shared collections

Permission Management: Configure which collections can be used as replacement sources

Compatibility Checking: Ensures replacement variables match original types
plugins.tagline: Scans for variables in a selection and reports the source(s) of those variables.

138331.name: Variable Linter
138331.description:
A Figma plugin that helps analyze, audit, and replace variables in your Figma designs. Scan selected layers for bound variables, categorize them by source, and efficiently replace variables with those from approved collections.


Features


🔍 Variable Analysis


Deep Scanning: Analyzes nested components, variants, and instances

Source Categorization: Identifies variables as local, team library, or orphaned

Type-Safe Analysis: Categorizes variables by type (color, number, string, boolean)

Real-time Results: Instant scanning of selected layers


📊 Variable Management


Approval System: Mark specific variable collections as approved replacement sources

Bulk Operations: Replace multiple variables of the same type simultaneously

Individual Replacement: Replace variables one at a time with precise control

Orphan Detection: Identifies variables that no longer exist in their collections


🎯 Smart Filtering


Toggle Views: Switch between all variables and unapproved variables only

Sortable Tables: Sort by name, type, value, or source

Search & Filter: Find specific variables quickly


📋 Team Library Integration


Library Detection: Automatically identifies team libraries and shared collections

Permission Management: Configure which collections can be used as replacement sources

Compatibility Checking: Ensures replacement variables match original types
138331.tagline: Scans for variables in a selection and reports the source(s) of those variables.

plugins.name: Tablify
plugins.description:
Tablify is a powerful and flexible plugin that turns structured data into clean, styled tables directly in your Figma files. Whether you’re working with CSVs, Google Sheets, Excel files, or even Word documents, Tablify makes it effortless to visualize your data with consistency and control.


Features


Multiple Input Formats


  1. Upload from CSV, TSV, Excel (.xlsx/.xls), Word (.docx), PDF, HTML, XML, ODS, ODT
  2. Supports Google Sheets via public URL — just paste the link, choose a sheet, and you’re ready to go
  3. Drag & drop supported for local files


Intelligent Parsing


  1. Detects and handles multiple tables per document (e.g. Excel sheets or Word tables)
  2. Automatically cleans and parses content for structured layout
  3. Handles complex table structures, colspans, and headers


Design-Ready Tables


  1. Generates clean, structured Figma components
  2. Supports auto layout or fixed layout styles
  3. Responsive to Figma color variables, padding, radius, fonts, and more


Customization Options


  1. Auto Layout
  2. Header Row
  3. Style Variables (automatically created and bound)
  4. Automatically generates reusable tokens for colors, sizes, and text styles


Perfect for


  1. UI and product designers
  2. Dashboards, admin panels, data-heavy UIs
  3. Rapid prototyping with live spreadsheet content
  4. Importing structured data into Figma layouts with no manual copying


Why Tablify?


Unlike basic table creators, Tablify focuses on precision, flexibility, and deep Figma integration. It’s built for speed and scale — helping you go from spreadsheet to structured layout in seconds.


💬 Questions or feedback? Telegram ・ Email

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Table Generator for Figma

plugins.name: MockMeal – great if the recipes are placeholders/mock content
plugins.description:
🍽️ Receipts Library – The Ultimate Recipe Plugin for Designers! 🧑‍🍳

Easily search and explore thousands of delicious recipes right inside Figma! 🔍

With just a few clicks, you’ll get:

📸 A mouthwatering image

📝 A catchy title & full description

📂 Category tags

👨‍🍳 Full step-by-step instructions


Perfect for food app UIs, restaurant menus, cooking projects, or just for fun!

No more lorem ipsum 🍝 — spice up your designs with real, tasty content! 🌶️✨

plugins.name: Uncomponent
plugins.description: Uncomponent is a smart Figma plugin that lets you instantly convert components back into editable frames—without the hassle of copying, detaching, or losing layout and styles. Whether you're cleaning up design systems, experimenting with layouts, or debugging nested structures, Uncomponent gives you full control while keeping your workflow smooth, fast, and intuitive.
plugins.tagline: Break free from components—no copy, no detach, just uncomponent.

plugins.name: Fastr Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin can convert a Figma file into a Fastr compatible format. This will generate a .zip file that you can import into Fastr Frontend platform. One quick import is all it takes to transform your Figma files into fully interactive experiences—brand components, fonts, and layouts intact. Get ready to edit, animate, and publish designs faster than ever before.


How to use the plug-in

If you have any issues when using the plugin, we recommend visiting our community article, which has a full guide and FAQs. For more information about the Fastr Frontend platform, please visit our website.


Reporting Issues

For any questions, please email support@getfastr.com and our team can assist further


License


This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

Copyright (c) KALEIDOS INC

The Fastr Exporter was built using the Penpot Exporter.

Penpot and the Penpot exporter plugin are Kaleidos’ open source projects.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Bring Your Figma Designs into Fastr Frontend

plugins.name: Chat IO
plugins.description:
AI-Powered Chat Interface

- Interactive AI Assistant : Chat with an AI that analyzes your selected Figma content (text layers, frames, components)

- Context-Aware Responses : The AI understands your selected design elements and provides relevant feedback

- Multi-language Support : Automatically detects and responds in the user's language

- Conversation Memory : Maintains context between messages for coherent discussions


Smart Text Replacement System

- AI-Driven Content Generation : Replace selected text layers with AI-generated content based on custom instructions

- Multiple Layer Support : Handle single or multiple text layers simultaneously

- Pre-built Templates : Quick-access buttons for common tasks:

- Summarize : Condense text content concisely

- Improve Text : Enhance clarity, reduce repetition, fix sentence structure

- Improve CTA : Optimize call-to-action buttons following UX best practices

- Task Generator : Convert project descriptions into actionable to-do lists


Generate Task Flow

- Automatic annotation generation: Analyzes the selected frames in Figma and generates descriptive annotations for each one.

- A relevant title for each frame. A concise description that explains the purpose of the frame Interactive element marking:

- Automatically identifies all elements with prototype interactions within the selected frames.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma plugin for intelligent content generation and design feedback using LLM API.

plugins.name: Font Classifier
plugins.description:
Font Classifier helps designers sort fonts into custom categories like Serif, Display, Branding, and more.

Quickly preview and apply fonts to selected text layers in Figma without digging through the full font list.

No more scrolling through 1000+ alphabetically listed fonts — just categorize your favorites and access them instantly.

Ideal for web, UI, and graphic designers who want faster access to curated typefaces.

Save time, stay consistent, and build your own font system directly in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Organize, preview, and apply fonts by category — faster typography for designers.

137007.description:

137007.tagline: Organize, preview, and apply fonts by category — faster typography for designers.

plugins.name: Flatten Wizard
plugins.description:
Flatten Wizard turns complex vector layers into clean, export-ready shapes with one click.


It merges overlapping paths, removes outlines, simplifies structure, and optionally subtracts shapes from each other — perfect for preparing icons and scalable UI assets.


🪄 Select your frames → Click “Make magic” → Flattened!
plugins.tagline: Automatically flattens vector shapes into clean, scalable results — perfect for export.
